author: rovere
body:
This PR will introduce the following changes:

* the number of jobs used to test the timing menu has been increased by a factor 2 to make full usage of the testing machine capabilities.

* A new test is added to measure the timing of the NGTScouting path that has been recently added.

#### PR description:

Test the HLT Phase2 Timing menu under more realistic conditions.
Add the monitoring of the NGTScouting path.

#### PR validation:

Will be done using this PR.
title: Improve HLT Phase2 timing test.
